verbose_text: In the short term, GLP-2 increases intestinal blood flow [XREF_BIBR] while over the longer term in noninflamed tissue it specifically increases crypt cell proliferation (CCP), with subsequent increases in crypt depth and villus height and a net increase in mucosal nutrient transport [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: GLP-2 increases intestinal blood flow [ XREF_BIBR ] while over the longer term in noninflamed tissue it specifically increases crypt cell proliferation (CCP), with subsequent increases in crypt depth and villus height and a net increase in mucosal nutrient transport
